variable.tooltip:
Time between exhausts at speed step 1, 1476/time,
range 1-65535, lower = fewer beats per second.

label.text: Note, this pane is still work in progress.
Particularly note that strong time for SL75 is CV146, previous decoders were CV129.
Recommend care when changing settings, and take notes. Information on how this pane with
works with different decoders would be welcome.
Sound type selection
Full speed rate, or if chuff sensor used,
divider for number of chuff pulses per wheel revolution
Low speed chuff rate (two byte number)
Strong and Weak time sets period for acceleration
and decelleration sounds to be heard

display.tooltip: acceleration noise triggered by this setting
coasting noise triggered by this setting

label.text: Brake and Acceleration Sounds
Sound options

display.item: No Sound moving to stop (brake squeal)

label.text: Sound Frequency, alters apparent size of locomotive
Values 0(max) to 3 for older firmware, 0 to 64 for newer firmware
Set function keys to turn on/off main sound and sound slots in Function Map
Slot Sound Levels, automatic and function key repetition rates, CV's 112, 113, 122 to 128, 145
Each slot can play randomly when standing or when moving. Set with checkboxes below.
Sounds can also be played by function key (set in function map), with repetitions and if sound
is made of five components can be made to loop for continuous sounds (see CT manuals)
The Alt key (see Function Map) acts as a 'shift'; when the Alt is active, sound slots 9-16
are played in place of slots 1-8, with the same key and repetition options for each bank of slots
